Sentencas: Glasses of composition (60-x)SiO2-15CaO-10Al(2)O(3)-(10 + x)Na2O-5TiO(2) (x = 0, 5, 10, 15) were prepared.
Titulo: Microstructural study of Crofer 22 APU-glass interface for SOFC application

Sentencas: The crystallization kinetics of prepared glasses were investigated by differential thermal analyzer, dilatometer and X-ray diffraction techniques.
Titulo: Microstructural study of Crofer 22 APU-glass interface for SOFC application

Sentencas: In order to check the applicability of the prepared glasses as a sealant in solid oxide fuel cell, these were deposited on Crofer 22 APU steel by slurry technique and thermally treated.
Titulo: Microstructural study of Crofer 22 APU-glass interface for SOFC application

Sentencas: The interface of the glass-steel composites was further analyzed under scanning electron microscope in conjunction with energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy and X-ray dot mapping.
Titulo: Microstructural study of Crofer 22 APU-glass interface for SOFC application

Sentencas: All glass samples exhibit phase separation.
Titulo: Microstructural study of Crofer 22 APU-glass interface for SOFC application

Sentencas: The phase separation tendency increases with increasing content of Na2O in glasses.
Titulo: Microstructural study of Crofer 22 APU-glass interface for SOFC application

Sentencas: The N-10 glass containing 10% Na2O shows good adhesion with Crofer 22APU.
Titulo: Microstructural study of Crofer 22 APU-glass interface for SOFC application
